title: Matthew McConaughey
description:
Matthew McConaughey (Greenlights) talks to Justin about his new memoir, he reflects on his childhood in Texas, and Matthew shares his thoughts on people imitating him. 


Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Talkspace - To match with a licensed therapist today, go to Talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code LONG to get $100 off of your first month

Vuori - For our listeners, they’re offering 20% off your first purchase. Get yourself some of the most comfortable and versatile clothing on the planet at vuoriclothing.com/LONG
